Articles.Content:
Changing inputs is possible, but the paired keypress method used is virtually impossible with a joystick, the same direction of the axes being used for both inputs.

Certain axes of the joystick, like the throttle, aren't recognised at all.

I posted about the same issues a week ago.  Thank you for at least verifying that I'm not the only one having this problem.

I filed a bug report on the PD support page, you might as well do one as well.
Would majorly like to see joystick support added. I never flew a single rocket in KSP1 without a joystick.
I'm a big joystick fan.  was surprised when the new game hit and found out people fly without a stick.  esp with aircraft
DEV answered question about joysticks here...
